Hi,

 I have recently started using the Matlab NEAT and noticed what seems
=
to be a duplicated connection from the bias to the output nodes.

The confi=
guration of the net is the following, one input and one
output. The bias no=
de is added by the NEAT.

nodegenes =3D

     1     2     3 %(index)
     1=
     4     2 %(node type: 1 input, 2 output, 4 bias, 3 extra)
     0     1 =
    0 %(input state)
     0     0     0 %(output state)

connectiongenes =
=3D

    1.0000    2.0000    3.0000  %(index)
    1.0000    [2.0000*] [2.00=
00*] %(node from)
    3.0000    [3.0000*] [3.0000*] %(node to)
   -0.5224  =
  0.0140    0.3759  %(weights)
    1.0000    1.0000    1.0000  %(on/off)

(=
[*] marks the duplicated connections)

Thanks!
Marcos.
